snippet.title: Shadowrun Trilogy: Console Edition - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
The Legendary Shadowrun Trilogy, including Shadowrun Returns, Shadowrun: Hong Kong and Shadowrun: Dragonfall, is coming to all current and last-gen consoles on 21st of June, and is available for Pre-Order with a 25 % discount!
Prepare to explore this dystopian cyberpunk future in which magic has re-awakened!

https://www.paradoxinteractive.com/games/shadowrun-trilogy/


Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

ParadoxExtra - http://youtube.com/ParadoxExtra
Gameplay of our video games, convention coverage, and other fun things from Paradox!

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK2, EU4, HOI4, Stellaris, and Imperator.
